Up.Statement: IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT setting_id FROM [w2_ProductListDispSetting] WHERE setting_id = '14') BEGIN INSERT INTO [w2_ProductListDispSetting] ( setting_id ,setting_name ,disp_enable ,disp_no ,default_disp_flg ,description ,date_changed ,last_changed ) VALUES ( '14' ,N'お気に入り登録数' ,'OFF' ,'11' ,'OFF' ,N'商品のお気に入り登録数(降順)で商品一覧を表示します。' ,GETDATE() ,'ｗ２ユーザー' ) END
